release.notes:
Recorded in New York, December 1954.

From liner notes:  "This record is a result of a session for Period Records that was originally issued on two ten inch records and called 'Jazzical Moods.'  Bethlehem acquired this material and repackaged and remastered it as this twelve inch record."

Manufactured in Czech Republic.
